## My Analysis
We can clearly see from the graphs that The Petal length and petal width for setosa is completely different from the other flowers,
Also comparing Petal width of versicolor and Virginica, We can see that the range of petal width for both of them is different.
Hence using simple python program for knowing the flowers will also give a good Result.
